title: Ticket #3692: missing libdate-manip-perl dependency in debian condor packages
description:
The condor_gather_info script depends on the Date::Manip Perl module, but the Debian package we release does not specify this dependency. (On Debian, that module is in the libperl-date-manip package). The RPMs are fine -- the rpm build tools correctly autodetected it.

This affects the official UW Debian RPMs.
remarks:
2013-Jun-11 12:19:40 by gthain:
CODE REVIEW 6/11/2013 I'm not a cpack expert, but this change is good -- let's push it.
check_ins:

2013-Jun-10 17:10   Check-in [36527]: Added libdate-manip-perl dependency to Debian packages. This provides the Date::Manip Perl library, which is required for condor_gather_info. ===GT=== #3692 (By Matyas Selmeci )
